programmes.show_description: Cuireann Roman i leith Nestor gurb é a bhí taobh thiar d'fheallmharú Landon. (Roman accuses Nestor of having been behind the assassination of Congressman Landon.)
Craoladh ar imeachtaí na maidine de riar na hoibre i nDáil Éireann. (Coverage of today's proceedings in Dáil Éireann.)
Ceiliúradh ar amhráin a bhíodh againn ag éirí aníos. (Series which celebrates and takes a fresh look at the songs of our schooldays.)
Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)
Is é an siúlóir Jamie Costin a bheidh ag caitheamh seal le Dáithí Ó Sé ar an gclár. (Dáithí Ó Sé will be chatting with race walker Jamie Costin on the show.)
Is é an t-iománaí as Aontroim Neil McManus a bheidh faoi chaibidil sa gclár seo. (This programme focuses on Antrim hurler Neil McManus.)
Is 'Clár speisialta Wildcard' a bheidh ann ar an seó tallainne seo anocht! (Tonight it's the Wildcard Special!)
Cainéal nuachta 24 uair an chloig na Fraince atá i France 24. (FRANCE 24 is France's 24 hour international news channel.)
Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)
Is beag foighne a bhíonn ag Clúmh nuair a bhíonn ocras air! (A hungry Fluff is a persistent Fluff!)
Tá sé in am againn fear sneachta a thógáil! (Let's build a snow friend in CoComelon Lane!)
Tá sé in am torthaí a chur! (It's time to grow grow grow your fruit!)
Tasipeáineann Dora ceolbhosca don chúpla agus tagann anam sa damhsóir atá istigh ann! (Dora shows the twins a music box with a dancer that comes to life!)
Ag foghlaim faoi chruthanna a beidh Elmo inniu. (Elmo is learning all about shapes today.)
Éiríonn Pip as ag péinteáil mar nach maith leis féin an pictiúr atá déanta aige. (When Pip and Posy's duckling painting goes wrong, Pip wants to give up.)
Cumann na hOlobobanna cluiche liathróide nua ach níl siad ar aon intinn faoi na rialacha! (The Olobobs invent a new ball game, but can't agree on the rules.)
Féachann Cailín Luna le haird Catboy a dhíriú ar nithe eile. Meas tú an éireoidh léi? (Luna Girl tries to distract the PJ's with legends of Catability.)
Foghlaimíonn Wussywat go bhfuil sé go deas a bheith ag spraoi in éineacht le do chuid cairde. (Wussywat discovers playing with her friends can be fun.)
Tá gach uile dhuine ar an mbaile ar bís na sméara a phiocadh agus milseog bhlasta a réiteach. (Everyone in town is excited to pick the berries and prepare a delicious dessert.)
Féachann Pip le leigheas a fháil ar an tinneas atá ar Woozle. (Pip decides to cure a poorly Woozle.)
Téann Gingers agus na Piseanna-Rex Óga amú ar an mbealach abhaile. (While leading the baby Pea-Rexes home, Ginger gets lost.)
Ní maith le Alice go bhfuil rudaí athraithe tigh Emile. (Alice is upset that some things are different in Emile's house.)
Tugann Alice aire do dhragún óg. (Alice looks after a baby dragon.)
Tá cluiche nua ag Alice le bata, druma agus liathroid. (Alice creates a new game, with a bat, a drum and a ball.)
Tagann na Neacha Beaga ar chleite aisteach agus tá siad ag iarraidh a fháil amach cá as a dtáinig sé. (The Reefies find a mysterious feather and head off to find the owner.)
Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)
Ní maith le Lola nuair a bhíonn daoine eile ag iarraidh cúnamh a thabhairt di caisleán gainimh a dhéanamh. (Lola is annoyed when other people try to help build her sandcastle.)
Tá Tim ar bís le carabú óg a thabhairt abhaile agus níl sé ag tabhairt aon aird ar a bhfuil timpeall air. (Tim gets overly excited to reunite a caribou calf with its herd.)
Cath na róbat a bheidh idir Lola agus Victor inniu. (Lola and Victor have a big robot battle.)
Socraíonn Angelo cairde eile a dhéanamh in áit Sherwood agus Lola atá imithe ar saoire. (When Sherwood and Lola go on holidays, Angelo decides to replace them.)
Tá Dónall ag iarraidh go mbeidh Ga páirteach i gcomórtas in aghaidh púdail. (Henry gets Fang involved in a competition against a poodle.)
Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)
Amhrán spraíúil faoi bheith sásta a bheidh againn inniu. (A fun song about being happy!)
Beidh an-spraoi ag na Blocuimhreacha ag dul i bhfolach inniu! (The number friends take turns hiding behind each other in a song and dance all about bigger and smaller.)
Téann na dathanna ar fad ar thuras atá eagraithe ag Dearg. (All the colours go on an exciting tour with Red.)
Tá ár gcairde ag iarraidh breathnú ar scannán, ach an mbeidh Gabh agus Stop in ann é a chur ar siúl? (It's film night, but how can Go and Stop get the movie to start?)
Tá Timmy faoi phuiteach ach níl sé ag iarraidh folcadh a ghlacadh. (Muddy Timmy is determined not to have a bath.)
Tá Feilimí leis an lá a chaitheamh in éineacht lena Dhaideo Lorcán inniu. (Feilimí is going to spend the day with Daideo today.)
Nuair a chailleann Posy eitleog Phip, cumann sí scéal gur goideadh uaithi í. (When Posy loses Pip's kite, she makes up a story about a big girl taking it.)
Faigheann Art amach nach raibh i nGruagach Gránna na gCrann ach dhá iora rua ag súgradh. (Art discovers that LoggieLooBoo is just two squirrels playing in a hollow log.)
Na haidiachtaí sealbhacha: 'mo', 'do' agus 'ár' a bheidh le foghlaim ag na Béiríní inniu. (The Bears learn about possession: 'mine', 'yours' and 'ours'.)
Inniu Lá an Cheoil ag Post Pikwik ach níl Tibor an-tógtha le ceol Shípéir. (It's Music Day at the Pikwik Post, but Sípéir's horn doesn't sound like music to Tibor's ears.)
Samhlaíonn Muireann a saol ina ceoltóir nuair a bheidh sí mór. (Muireann imagines her life as a musician when she grows up, with the help of the Job Fairy.)
Rachaidh Zou agus Daideo ag tóraíocht thoirtís nia Bhean Uí Zolli inniu. (Zou and Grandpa search for Mrs Zolli's nephew's tortoise today.)
Is bleachtaire í Mewmew inniu. (Mewmew is a detective today and is looking for a mystery to solve.)
Inniu beidh madra agus liathróid phreabach aige agus éinín ag breathnú ar an teilifís.  (Today we have a dog getting a bouncy ball surprise & a bird changes the channel.)
Eoin Ó Niaidh a bheidh ag comhrá le Máirtín an tseachtain seo. (Eoin Ó Niaidh is this week's guest.)
Tá amhras ar Dorothy faoin altra postúil a d'fhostaigh sí chun aire a thabhairt do Sophia. (Dorothy has reservations about an opinionated nurse she hires to care for Sophia.)
Faigheann Blanche amach go bhfuil an iomarca tionóntaí aici. (Blanche discovers she has exceeded the legal number of tenants she is allowed.)
Ceiliúradh ar amhráin a bhíodh againn ag éirí aníos. (A look back at songs we knew growing up.)
Fiosraíonn Jessica an cás nuair a chúisítear banaltra óg i ndúnmharú beirt othar a bhí faoina cúram. (Jessica investigates when a young nurse is accused of murdering two patients.)
Is minic a bhíonn páistí faiteach agus faoi bhrú nuair thosaíonn siad sa naíonra. (The start of the Naíonra year brings a mix of nerves and tears.)

programmes.show_name: Taste of Australia with Hayden Quinn
programmes.show_description: Téann Hayden ar chrús ar Abhainn Tweed sula réitíonn sé béile breá le portáin. (Hayden goes on a cruise on the Tweed River before creating a tasty salt-baked crab dish!)
Físeáin cheoil le Matt Leavy, Pamela Gilmartin, Derek Ryan, T.R. Dallas, Chantelle Padden agus David James. (This week features Matt Leavy, Pamela Gilmartin & more.)
Tá Lara tinn den truailliú in Sydney agus tá sí ag iarraidh bogadh go Byron Bay lena beirt iníon. (Lara is searching for a house in Byron Bay for herself and her two daughters.)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)
Ní insíonn Diane do Sam go bhfuil sí ag dul amach le haghaidh dinnéir leis an bhfear a bhí geallta léi. (Diane doesn't tell Sam that she is going out to dinner with her ex-fiancé.)
Clár nuachta do dhaoine óga ina gclúdaítear scéalta áitiúla, náisiúnta agus idirnáisiúnta. (News programme for young people covering local, national and international news.)
Scoil Phádraig Naofa i gCo. na Gaillimhe a bheidh ag tabhairt faoin scamall draíochta inniu. (St. Patrick's Primary School from Co. Galway take on the magical cloud today.)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)
Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)
Craoaldh beo ar an gcluiche idir Caerdydd agus Cúige Laighean sa gCraobh Aontaithe Rugbaí. (Live coverage of Cardiff v Leinster in the United Rugby Championship.)

programmes.show_name: Síle Seoige: An Saol Mar Atá
programmes.show_description: Tugann Síle Seoige léargas ar chúrsaí bulaíochta sa gclár seo. (Síle Seoige tries to understand the dark world of bullying.)
Tá náire ar bhuachaill bó nuair a fhaigheann sé amach gur teach striapachais é an gnólacht rathúil atá aige. (A cowboy finds that the successful business he has inherited is a house of prostitution.)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)
Fágfar slán le triúr d'iomaitheoirí Glór Tíre 2026 anocht. Caith do vóta ar Aip Ghlór Tíre. (The first elimination show of Glór Tíre 2026. Cast your votes on the Glór Tíre App.)
Is i gCaisleán Órán Mór a chastar John Conneely agus Síomha ar a chéile agus is léir láithreach an ceangal eatarthu. (John Conneely and Síomha; musicians breathing new life into classics.)

programmes.show_name: Taste of Australia with Hayden Quinn
programmes.show_description: Téann Hayden ar chrús ar Abhainn Tweed sula réitíonn sé béile breá le portáin. (Hayden goes on a cruise on the Tweed River before creating a tasty salt-baked crab dish!)
Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)
Is minic a bhíonn páistí faiteach agus faoi bhrú nuair thosaíonn siad sa naíonra. (The start of the Naíonra year brings a mix of nerves and tears.)
Tá Aoife De Barra ag súil le leanbh & le caifé úr a oscailt roimh dheireadh an tsamhraidh. (Aoife De Barra is expecting a baby & hoping to have a new cafe opened by summer.)
Tá ceamaraí socraithe i gcarranna ar fud na hÉireann sa chaoi is go mbeifear in ann cúléisteacht le daoine. (This show features cars rigged with cameras allowing us to eavesdrop.)
Máire Pheteir Uí Dhroighneáin a bheidh ar chlár an lae inniu. Today's guest is Ros na Rún actress Máire Uí Dhroighneáin.
Cainéal nuachta 24 uair an chloig na Fraince atá i France 24. (FRANCE 24 is France's 24 hour international news channel.)
Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)
Tá an tsamhlaíocht ag fáil an cheann is fearr ar Ribín! (Ribín's imagination runs away with her.)
Tá Bobby an Bhus faoi bhrú agus tá na meicneoirí ar thóir taisce. (Bobby the Bus is under pressure and the mechanics go treasure hunting.)
Tugann Cory cúnamh do Chrissy agus dá cara nua, Lúnaí. (Cory lends a helping hand to Chrissy and her new friend, Looney.)
Tá an t-arbhar réidh le baint ach tá na préacháin á ithe. (The corn is ready to harvest, but the crows are eating it!)
Tá teileascóp Mhaor Nat tite go bun na haille. An mbeidh na cairde in ann cabhrú leis? (Ranger Nat's telescope has fallen to the bottom of a cliff. Can the Mechas help?)
Inniu Lá Mór na Leabhar ach tá na leabhair uilig ar iarraidh. Meas tú cé a sciob iad? (It's the Pretty Big All City Read but all the books are missing?)
Níl foighne ar bith ag Catboy agus leanann ag déanamh an bhotúin chéanna arís agus arís eile. (Catboy keeps leaping into action rather than waiting to come up with a plan.)
Ba bhreá le Finny a bheith ina Sár-Shiorc nuair a bheidh sí mór! (Finny wants to be the superhero Wonder Shark one day!)
Níl snámh ag Caitríona ach ní call di a bheith ag déanamh imní mar tá Roy in ann é a mhúineadh di. (Caitríona can't swim but there's no need to worry, Roy can teach her.)
Bíonn an-spraoi ag Ricky ag imirt cleasa ar Tyra inniu. (Today, Ricky has fun tricking Tyra.)
Beidh Ricky agus Boo ag dul campáil inniu ach meas tú an mbeidh faitíos orthu? (Ricky and Boo try their very best not to be scared while camping out, but will they succeed?)
Tá sé cinnte ar Ricky agus a mhuintir súil a choinneáil ar Chráca! (Today, Ricky and his family have a very hard time keeping an eye on Kracken!)
Beidh na Singalings ag dul ar scoil inniu - hup! (The Singalings are going to school today - hooray!)
Téann na Singalings chuig an ollmhargadh. (Join the Singalings as they head to the supermarket.)
Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)
Tugann an Cat, Nic agus Sailí cuairt ar thrí ainmhí a dhéanann rudaí ar bhealaí éagsúla. (The Cat takes Nick and Sally to meet three animals who do things differently.)
Níl a fhios ag Nic ná ag Sailí cén séasúr is fearr leo. Tugann an Cat chuig gairdín speisialta iad. (The Cat takes Nick and Sally to the Magical Garden of Seasons.)
Níl a fhios ag Nic cén séasúr is fearr leis. Tugann an Cat, Nic agus Sailí cuairt ar an ngairdín speisialta. (The Cat takes Nick & Sally back to the Magical Garden of Seasons.)
Níl aon mhil fanta ag Sailí ná ag Nic. Ach ar an dea-uair tá a fhios ag an gCat cá bhfaighidh sé tuilleadh de! (Sally and Nick have run out of honey!)
Tá an gabhlán corcra a bhí i ngairdín Shailí imithe amú. (The purple martin swallow that lives in Sally's backyard has gone missing!)
Tagann draíodóir chun na scoile agus iarrtar ar Zak agus ar Jason cabhrú leis. (A magician comes to visit the school and Zak and Jason are asked to help out.)
Ní bhfuair Zak cuireadh chuig cóisir Olivia ach éiríonn leis dul ann sa deireadh. (Zak has not been invited to Olivia's birthday party but he manages to figure out a way to go!)
Buaicphointí CLG agus Peil na mBan ó chluichí an deireadh seachtaine. (Highlights of the weekend's best GAA and Ladies Football action.)
Clár speisialta ina dtiocfaidh seacht dteaghlach a cuireadh as an áireamh ar ais! (The search for Ireland's most talented family continues. Tonight, it's the Wildcard Special!)
Tá babhta ceannais Síorstíl buailte linn! Beidh Don O'Neill ar ais ina aoi-mholtóir. (We have reached the final of Síorstíl! Don O'Neill returns as guest judge.)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

Craoladh beo ar an gcluiche idir an Cabhán agus Contae Lú i mbabhta 5 de Shraith Peile Allianz Roinn 2. (Live coverage of Cavan v Louth in round 5 of the Allianz Football League.)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

Craoladh beo ar an gcluiche idir Corcaigh agus Port Láirge i mbabhta 5 de Shraith Lidl. (Live coverage of Cork v Waterford in Round 5 of the Lidl League.)
Buaileann Áine le Siobhán de Paor agus a páirtí Diarmuid Lyng sa gclár seo. (Áine gets an insight into the lives of Siobhán de Paor and her partner Diarmuid Lyng.)
Cuireann bean atá colscartha suim i bhfear eile ach is cosúil go raibh sé pósta ag cara léi tráth. (A woman learns that the man she is interested in is her friend's ex-husband.)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)
Is beag atá ag tarlú i saol thriúr fear i mBaile Átha Cliath an lae inniu. (Three friends go back in time to Easter 1916 and realise they have the power to change Irish history.)
